abstract: A quantity sample type that measures the number of standard alcoholic drinks that the user has consumed.
overview:
## Discussion

Samples matching the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityTypeIdentifier/numberOfAlcoholicBeverages] identifier measure the number of standard alcoholic drinks consumed by the user. A standard drink is one beer, glass of wine, or mixed drink made with spirits. The samples use count units (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit]) to measure cumulative values (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityAggregationStyle]).

The following code listing saves a single standard drink to the HealthKit store.
